articles.title: Generation Xanax: The Dark Side of America’s Wonder Drug - The Wall Street Journal
Compact Light Phone 3 for minimalists expected to be available from late March - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: The Light Phone 3, one of the most unusual smartphones on the market, is set to launch soon. Sporting a 3.92-inch AMOLED display, the smartphone is not only extremely compact, its minimalist user interface is designed to avoid unnecessary distractions.

articles.title: T-Mobile is raising prices on some of its prized legacy plans - The Verge
articles.description: T-Mobile is increasing legacy plans by $5 per line per month starting April 2nd.

articles.title: Konami's Japan-set Silent Hill f resurfaces with eerie new trailer and fresh details - Eurogamer
articles.description: It's been a good long while since Silent Hill f was unveiled as part of Konami's four-game series revival back in 2022.…

articles.title: Apple’s AirPods 4 are down to their lowest price to date - The Verge
articles.description: The AirPods 4, Apple’s entry-level earbuds, are on sale for just $99.99 right now. You can also pick up the AirPods 4 with ANC for about $50 more.

articles.title: Kuo: Cook Should Personally Address Siri Apple Intelligence Failure - MacRumors
articles.description: Apple made a major misstep with the way that it handled the delay of Apple Intelligence features for Siri, Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said today....
